explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes using an ensemble of machine learning algorithms to predict students at-risk, indicating a direct application of machine learning techniques.
explanations.classification: The paper mentions 'classification models' as part of the proposed solution, which involves categorizing students into at-risk or not at-risk groups.
explanations.ensemble of machine learning algorithms: The abstract explicitly states the use of an ensemble of machine learning algorithms (MLAs) to improve the prediction of students at-risk.
